abstract: Insider trading case extends to well-liked Indian executive.
snippet: Insider trading case extends to well-liked Indian executive.
lead_paragraph: United States prosecutors are expected to file criminal charges Wednesday against former McKinsey head Rajat K. Gupta, in connection with the Galleon Group insider trading case, The New York Times' DealBook reports.

headline.main: Criminal Charges for Gupta, Ex McKinsey Head
